resources.string: Enter the values and tags of the data set in the fields given below. For example, if the pie chart is of GDP distribution, add country name in the \"Tag\" field and GDP value in the \"Value\" field.
Please add values to the graph
Enter the X-coordinates and Y-coordinates of the data set in the fields given below. The X-coordinates data set can have any string input. For eg, \"January\", \"5\",\"2001\" etc.

Note: After creating a data set suppose for Company A, if you wish to add data set for Company B, click on \"Create New Dataset\" and add values for company B. After you have finished adding values, go back and plot the graph
Enter values for generating a bar chart over a range of data of Y values. The custom X-axis range feature will be updated in a few days.
